description: Attic Red-Figure Zone Cup Fragment (comprised of 3 Joined Fragments) (part of 87.AE.43.1); Attributed to Douris (Greek (Attic), active 500 - 460 B.C.), Possibly by Kleophrades (Greek (Attic), active about 490 B.C.); Athens, Greece; 500 - 480 B.C.; Terracotta; 8.5 cm (3 3/8 in.); 87.AE.45.5; Gift of Dietrich von Bothmer; J.
